title: Nathaniel Metcalfe - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #12
itunes:title: Nathaniel Metcalfe - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #12
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he gets into the world of cinema and mortality with good pal and awesome funny person NATHANIEL METCALFE!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he and his guest go deep into the subject of mortality via cinema, and this week you are treated to a guest appearance from Brett’s good friend and general funny person NATHANIEL METCALFE!


A thoroughly enjoyable and jolly episode and a great chance to get to know Nathaniel if you are yet unfamiliar… A full on selection of cinematic treats and experiences to get into from start to end, as they go in on open mic nights and what they really think of them (it’ll be no surprise), Nathaniel’s Twitter film viewing habit and what that’s all about, wanderlust versus potential ultimate enlightenment, developing mind tricks from early dealings with a paper wrangler, his napping dad, unintentional comedy, troubling sexy films at a young age, the slowness and length of 80’s films in retrospect and all the rest of that good good goodness that you have come to expect and deserve from Films To Be Buried With! Thanks for listening. Enjoy!


––––– ––––– –––––


THIS WEEK'S LINKS:


• NATHANIEL on TWITTER!

• NATHANIEL on THE INTERNET!

• His podcast 'FANCLUB' with NICK HELM!


• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM!

• 'SUPERBOB' - Brett's 2015 feature film!

• 'CORNERBOYS' with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!


• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on FACEBOOK

• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/filmstobeburiedwith.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
